block.p: MURPHY-William, of Silver Lake, Staten Island on July 18, 2000. Beloved son of Stephen Murphy and Edith D'Ambra. Maternal grandson of Margaret Baetz. Loving brother of Leah Murphy, Steven D'Ambra and the late Stephen Murphy. Fond uncle of Danielle and Steven Bozzo. Funeral from the Richmond Funeral Home, 2052 Richmond Rd at Midland Ave., Staten Island on Saturday at 10:30 AM. A mass of Christian burial will be celebrated at St. Christopher's R.C. Church at 11 AM. Cremation Rosehill Crematory. Friends will be received Thursday 7-9:30 PM and Friday 2-4 and 7-9:30 PM.
